execute(bytes32).notice: execute - Executes a validated deployment plan.

plan(string,string).notice: plan - Creates a deployment plan from a manifest and environment.

rollback(bytes32).notice: rollback - Rolls back an executed deployment plan.

status(bytes32).notice: status - Returns the current state of a deployment plan.

validate(bytes32).notice: validate - Validates a deployment plan's dependencies and schema compatibility.
